name: Mind Field (DanD0415)
description: The player wakes up in a jail cell he must escape by visiting different dream worlds. These dream worlds contain items and clues you can add to your inventory to progress through the game. After finding all the items a path of escape will be unlocked. Make sure to pay attention to your surroundings and story because not everything is as it seems. Do you have what it takes to uncover the story of the Mind Field?
